summary: This is an email chain regarding the filing of the government's opposition to Jeffrey Epstein's bail motion on July 12, 2019. It includes attachments of the legal document both with and without exhibits, and shows coordination among prosecutors to finalize and submit the filing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the government's opposition to bail motion being filed.

events.title: Government files opposition to Epstein's bail motion
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York files its opposition to Jeffrey Epstein's motion for bail.

keyFacts: On July 12, 2019, the government filed its opposition to Jeffrey Epstein's bail motion.
The filing was coordinated via email among Assistant United States Attorneys.
The opposition document was prepared in two versions: one with exhibits and one without.
